en.metaTitle: Kapunka Skincare | Moroccan Argan Rituals for Clinics & Sensitive Skin
en.metaDescription: Kapunka formulates Moroccan argan oils, mists, and hammam treatments trusted by aesthetic clinics for post-procedure recovery, barrier repair, and daily rituals.

meta.title: Kapunka Skincare | Moroccan Argan Rituals for Clinics & Sensitive Skin
meta.description: Kapunka formulates Moroccan argan oils, mists, and hammam treatments trusted by aesthetic clinics for post-procedure recovery, barrier repair, and daily rituals.

en.heroTitle: Clinical-grade Moroccan argan rituals for sensitive, recovering skin
en.heroSubtitle: From single-origin argan oil to dermal mists and hammam staples, Kapunka pairs Moroccan heritage with aesthetic expertise so post-procedure and delicate skin stays calm, nourished, and resilient.

hero.title: Clinical-grade Moroccan argan rituals for sensitive, recovering skin
hero.subtitle: From single-origin argan oil to dermal mists and hammam staples, Kapunka pairs Moroccan heritage with aesthetic expertise so post-procedure and delicate skin stays calm, nourished, and resilient.

bestsellers.intro: Meet the three-step ritual clinics rely on most—cleanse, replenish, and seal with nutrient-dense argan care.

cards.blurb: Targeted argan care for scars and marks.
Travel-ready hammam pack with Kessa mitt.

valueProps.title: Traceable Moroccan sourcing
valueProps.subtitle: Hand-harvested kernels pressed within 24 hours to preserve omega density.

valueProps.title: Post-treatment safe
valueProps.subtitle: Dermatology reviewed formulas bottled in GMP facilities for maximum purity.

valueProps.title: Multifunction rituals
valueProps.subtitle: One oil to repair the barrier, soothe scalp flare-ups, and gloss the body without residue.

valueProps.title: Sustainable impact
valueProps.subtitle: Partnership with Essaouira cooperatives reinvesting in women-led agriculture.

clinics.title: Trusted by dermatologists and aesthetic clinics
clinics.copy: Clinics select Kapunka for its purity and performance in post-laser and sensitive-skin care. Our minimalist routines support faster recovery, barrier integrity, and lasting comfort.

socialProof.line: Seen in skin clinics and care practices across Europe.

learn.teaser: Clear answers to real routines—post-procedure, scalp care, baby skin, and barrier support.

en.newsletterSubtitle: Tips for sensitive-skin routines, once or twice a month. No spam. Unsubscribe anytime.

newsletter.pitch: Join our community for monthly guidance on barrier health, post-treatment recovery, and skincare rooted in science. No spam, just insight.

footer.complianceNote: Cosmetic use only. Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.

pt.heroTitle: Rituais de argan marroquino de padrão clínico para pele sensível e em recuperação

hero.title: Rituais de argan marroquino de padrão clínico para pele sensível e em recuperação
hero.subtitle: Dos óleos de argan de origem única às névoas dérmicas e clássicos do hammam, a Kapunka une herança marroquina e expertise estética para manter a pele pós-procedimento calma, nutrida e resiliente.

bestsellers.intro: Conheça o ritual em três etapas preferido nas clínicas—limpar, repor e selar com o cuidado nutritivo do argan.

cards.blurb: Cuidado de argan direcionado para cicatrizes e marcas.
Pack hammam pronto para viajar com luva Kessa.

valueProps.title: Origem marroquina rastreável
valueProps.subtitle: Sementes colhidas à mão e prensadas em até 24 horas para preservar os ômegas.

valueProps.title: Seguro pós-tratamento

valueProps.title: Rituais multifuncionais

clinics.title: Confiado por dermatologistas e clínicas estéticas
clinics.copy: As clínicas escolhem a Kapunka pela pureza e performance no cuidado pós-laser e pele sensível. Nossas rotinas minimalistas favorecem recuperação mais rápida, integridade da barreira e conforto duradouro.

socialProof.line: Presente em clínicas e consultórios de cuidados da pele na Europa.

learn.teaser: Respostas claras para rotinas reais—pós-procedimento, couro cabeludo, pele do bebé e apoio da barreira.

pt.newsletterSubtitle: Dicas para rotinas de pele sensível, uma ou duas vezes por mês. Sem spam. Cancele quando quiser.

newsletter.pitch: Junte-se à nossa comunidade para orientações mensais sobre saúde da barreira, recuperação pós-tratamento e cuidados com a pele baseados em ciência. Sem spam, apenas insights.

footer.complianceNote: Uso cosmético. Não destinado a diagnosticar, tratar, curar ou prevenir doenças.

es.heroSubtitle: Desde el argán de origen único hasta las brumas dérmicas y los clásicos del hammam, Kapunka une la herencia marroquí con la experiencia estética para que la piel post-procedimiento se mantenga calmada, nutrida y resiliente.

hero.title: Rituales de argán marroquí de nivel clínico para piel sensible y en recuperación

learn.teaser: Respuestas claras para rutinas reales—post-procedimiento, cuero cabelludo, piel de bebé y apoyo de la barrera.
